    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110140</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vstavljanje slike iz medmrežja</string>
            <string language="en">Inserting image from internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einsetzen des Bildes vom Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Insertion de l'image de l'Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzindo a imagem do Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inserimento dell'immagine dal Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρεμβολή της εικόνας από Διαδίκτυο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inserción de imagen del Internet</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec zna poiskati besedilo in sliko na medmrežju. Učenec zna vstaviti besedilo in sliko iz medmrežju v dokument</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan on how to teach pupils how to find text and images on the internet and how to insert them into their own document.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">internet</string>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vstavljanje</string>
            <string language="en">inserting</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan auf, wie man Pupillen unterrichtet, 
wie man Text und Bilder auf dem Internet findet und wie man sie in ihr
eigenes Dokument einsetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon sur la façon dont enseigner à 
pupilles comment trouver le texte et les images sur l'Internet et 
comment les insérer dans leur propre document.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição em como ensinar a pupilas como 
encontrar o texto e as imagens no Internet e como introduzi-los em seu
próprio original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione su come insegnare a pupille 
come trovare testo e le immagini sul Internet e come inserirli nel 
loro proprio documento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για το πώς να διδάξει τους μαθητές 
πώς να βρεί το κείμενο και τις εικόνες στο διαδίκτυο και πώς να 
τους παρεμβάλει στο έγγραφό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección en cómo enseñar a pupilas 
cómo encontrar el texto e imágenes en el Internet y cómo 
insertarlas en su propio documento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einsetzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">insertion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">introdução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inserimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαδίκτυο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα</string>

          <keyword>
